org.mini2Dx.core.quadtree

Interface Quad<T extends Positionable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PositionChangeListener<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    QuadTree<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RegionalQuad, RegionalQuadTree

    public interface Quad<T extends Positionable>
extends PositionChangeListener<T>
    A common interface to Quad implementations within a QuadTree implementation
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(T object)
      Adds an element to this Quad
      int getElementLimit()
      Returns the maximum number of elements per Quad
      int getNumberOfElements()
      Returns the number of elements within this Quad
      Quad<T> getParent()
      Returns the Quad this Quad is contained in
      List<T> getValues()
      Returns all elements within this Quad If this Quad contains child Quads then this will return all elements recursively within the children
      void remove(T object)
      Removes an element from this Quad

      • Methods inherited from interface org.mini2Dx.core.engine.PositionChangeListener

        positionChanged

    • Method Detail

      • getValues

        List<T> getValues()
        Returns all elements within this Quad If this Quad contains child Quads then this will return all elements recursively within the children
        Returns:
        An empty List if this Quad contains no elements

      • getElementLimit

        int getElementLimit()
        Returns the maximum number of elements per Quad
        Returns:

      • getNumberOfElements

        int getNumberOfElements()
        Returns the number of elements within this Quad
        Returns:
        0 if there are no elements within this Quad

      • getParent

        Quad<T> getParent()
        Returns the Quad this Quad is contained in
        Returns:
        Null if this is the root Quad

      • add

        void add(T object)
        Adds an element to this Quad
        Parameters:
        object - The element to be added

      • remove

        void remove(T object)
        Removes an element from this Quad
        Parameters:
        object - The element to be removed
